title: Ticket #5022: Increase log level of security message
description:
We recently had an incident at the Tier-0 where a harmless-looking upgrade failed miserably due to authentication issues.

When we hand-reproduced with high log levels and found this: 

04/24/15 16:40:15 (pid:10822) HANDSHAKE: excluding GSI: Failed to open GSI libraries: libltdl.so.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

If the user has explicitly configured GSI, we shouldn't silently turn it off - or at least should print this once at D_ALWAYS.
creator: bbockelm
